Title: SM should be asked if questions are not beeing answered
Recipient of message should be tagged
Important documents, which are not commited in Github, should be saved in the Google Drive folder
Troubleshooting and exchange of experiences related to docker in dev meeting
Update BOM if you add new packages
Notify everyone about dev meetings by writing a slack message
Start a thread in the slack gerneral channels for troubleshooting
Plan time for technical reviews, no last minute implementations
Protect main branch (except deliverable folder) from commits (only with PR)
Merge features to dev before meeting, merge dev (release candidate) to main directly after meeting
